title: 352: Chatty Bros: House Fires, Disneyland Crushes, & a “Phenomenal” Clayton Recap!
itunes:title: 352: Chatty Bros: House Fires, Disneyland Crushes, & a “Phenomenal” Clayton Recap!
description:
The Bros are back - with a new song?? They chat about the fire in Bekah and Grayston’s house, their shifting Disneyland feelings, crush red flags, and then they dive into Clayton’s latests episode recap which is again (surprise, surprise) the Shanae show. They process the infamous shrimp follow up, The Bros put themselves in Clayton’s position, Grayston shares thoughts on Rachel, Evan gets worked up about red wine, and much more! Then, of course, they wrap with some Plug Somethin’!

 

PLUG SOMETHIN’

***EPIC LEVELS: https://www.instagram.com/epic_levels/ - find music, podcast, shop, etc here: https://linktr.ee/epiclevels

***HUME SUPERNATURAL: https://www.instagram.com/humesupernatural/ https://humesupernatural.com/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***EVERLYWELL: get 20% off an at-home lab test at EVERYLWELL.COM/CHATTY

***SUPER SPECIOSA: go to GETSUPERLEAF.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY for 20% off your entire order!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
